daily_plan_req: Reynolds Liam attends college classes from 9:30 am to 1:00 pm and visits the gallery from 2:30 pm to 5:30 pm. In between, Reynolds Liam often spends his free time exploring cafe or bar.

learned: As an English literature major, Reynolds Liam has developed strong analytical and critical thinking skills. He has also gained a deep understanding of narrative structures and thematic analysis. Additionally, his recent interest in artificial intelligence has led him to acquire basic programming skills and knowledge of AI concepts.
currently: Reynolds Liam is currently working on a research project exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence and literature.
